iT.text:
=== Silent Void ===
V.0.1.4

\/     Changelog:     \/

-Added new custom functions in the GUI Layer
-Refined some variable names for readability
-Added features from /DEV Branch
-Added degauss effect after a scan is completed
-Added Delta time implimentation. The Project can now properly run in 60FPS mode on Turbowarp
